rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî football player in action on field
rounds.pro_tip: MOTION BLUR: Real action shots have directional motion blur on fast-moving limbs. AI freezes every part of the image with unnatural sharpness, or applies blur uniformly instead of directionally.

STADIUM GEOMETRY: Real stadiums have precise, engineered lines ‚Äî yard markers, seat rows, structural beams. AI often warps these lines subtly, creating geometry that couldn't exist in physical space.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî football referee making a call
rounds.pro_tip: UNIFORM DETAILS: Real referee uniforms have specific stripe patterns, consistent stitching, and proper badge placement. AI often gets stripe spacing wrong or creates impossible fabric folds.
PYROTECHNICS: Real fireworks and stage effects have natural smoke dispersion, varied spark trajectories, and inconsistent brightness. AI pyrotechnics look too symmetrical and clean.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî football on grass field close-up
rounds.pro_tip: GRASS REALITY: Real grass has varied blade lengths, brown patches, divots, and natural color variation. AI grass is often a uniform green carpet that looks spray-painted.
SWEAT AND DIRT: Real athletes mid-game have uneven sweat patterns, grass stains in random spots, and smudged face paint. AI keeps athletes suspiciously clean or applies dirt too uniformly.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî packed stadium from upper deck view
rounds.pro_tip: DEPTH OF FIELD: Real telephoto shots from upper decks have natural depth-of-field falloff. The far side of the stadium gets progressively softer. AI often keeps everything in sharp focus.

METALLIC REFLECTIONS: Real trophies and metal objects reflect their actual surroundings ‚Äî you can see distorted images of nearby objects. AI reflections are often generic brightness without real environmental detail.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî football helmet close-up with visor
rounds.pro_tip: VISOR REFLECTIONS: Real helmet visors show distorted reflections of the surrounding environment ‚Äî stadium lights, other players, sky. AI visors often show impossibly clean or inconsistent reflections.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî retro scoreboard and stadium tech
rounds.pro_tip: DIGITAL DISPLAYS: Real LED scoreboards have visible pixel grids, slight color banding, and viewing-angle variation. AI scoreboards often look like flat images pasted onto the scene.
